channel.title: Running Automatic Back Ups?
channel.description:
I want to be able to run automatic backups of my Databases. Anyone know how to do this?
Thanks <3

item.title: Running Automatic Back Ups?
item.dc:creator: @N00b1 N00b1
item.description:
@N00b1 wrote:

[quote=“usernamelol, post:3, topic:53861”][quote author=N00b1 link=topic=76005.msg848082#msg848082 date=1170302379]
not a clue but i suppose that you could echo all of your data to a variable then just get that get that to save to a .txt

actually that would be no good because you just want a database not a txt

in a bit retarded sorry… good luck thou
[/quote]
Why reply when you don’t know? Thats NOT how you do it. It would need acess to the database using the user pass and database name…[/quote]

yeh i just realised that that’s why i said im retarded…

Read full topic
